content: For release on delivery  4:35 p.m. EST  November 12, 2010      Problems in the Mortgage Servicing Industry         Remarks by     Sarah Bloom Raskin     Member     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at the      National Consumer Law Center’s Consumer Rights Litigation Conference     Boston, Massachusetts                 November 12, 2010
